Yet we at the Center for the National Interest have been unable to ignore the media’s widespread bias since April 2016, when our magazine, the National Interest, hosted Mr. Trump’s first foreign-policy speech.
Every time President Trump writes off the mainstream media as “fake news,” members of the press are befuddled by how many Americans seem to agree.
Since then we have faced relentless biased attacks from supposedly objective media outlets.
